row.entry: Closing a connection for you. Please close them yourself
Throwable trying to close a connection for you, please close it yourself
Could not find a close method on alleged connection object. Please close your own connections
Some connections were not closed, see the log for the allocation stacktraces
Trying to return an unknown connection
SecurityContext setup failed since CallbackSecurity was null
SecurityContext setup failed since CallbackSecurity was null
Work execution context must be null because work instance implements WorkContextProviderStartTimeout is negative
SecurityContext setup failed since CallbackSecurity::Domain was empty
Registered a null handle for managed connection
Unregistered handle that was not registered
Unregistered a null handle for managed connection
Notified of error on a different managed connection
There is something wrong with the pooling
Unfinished local transaction - error getting local transaction
Unfinished local transaction but managed connection does not provide a local transaction
Reconnecting a connection handle that still has a managed connection
Method getManagedConnection retry wait was interrupted
You are trying to use a connection factory that has been shut down: ManagedConnectionFactory is null
Could not enlist in transaction on entering meta-aware object
Could not delist resource, probably a transaction rollback
Unable to set XAResource transaction timeout
You are trying to use a connection factory that has been shut down
Thread is not the enlisting thread

Destroying connection that could not be successfully matched
Throwable while trying to match managed connection, destroying connection
Destroying returned connection, maximum pool size exceeded
Warning: Background validation was specified with a non compliant ManagedConnectionFactory interface
Destroying connection that could not be successfully matched

Warning: ValidateOnMatch validation was specified with a non compliant ManagedConnectionFactory interface
Destroying connection that could not be validated
Unable to get managed connection pool
No managed connections available within configured blocking timeout
Unexpected throwable while trying to create a connection
The activation spec class is no longer available
The resource adapter is no longer available
Unable to lookup resource adapter in MDR
Error creating Subject for crash recovery
No security domain defined for crash recovery
Subject for crash recovery was null
Prepare called on a local tx. Use of local transactions on a JTA transaction with more than one branch may result in inconsistent data in some cases of failure
Trying to start a new transaction when old is not complete
Trying to start a new transaction with wrong flags
Error trying to start local transaction
Throwable trying to start local transaction
Forget not supported in local transaction
No recovery for LocalTransaction only resource manager
No @Connector was found and no definition in the ra.xml metadata either
More than one @Connector was found but the correct one wasn't defined in the ra.xml metadata
Reached end of xml document unexpectedly
You cannot define more than one pool or xa-pool in same connection-definition
Element cannot be set without an xa-pool
The resource adapter metadata must be defined
The resource adapter metadata must contain either an outbound or inbound configuration
Only one connection definition found with a mismatch in class-name
Only one admin object found with a mismatch in class-name
ManagedConnectionFactory must be defined in class-name
AdminObject must be defined in class-name
Connection factory implementation doesn't implement interface
Lock is locked during cleanup without an owner
Destroying connection that is not valid, due to the following exception
Error notifying of connection error for listener
Closing a statement you left open, please do your own housekeeping
Closing a result set you left open, please do your own housekeeping

Error during loading connection listener plugin
